title: Battle Boss first icon Mia
body: I completed the first battle boss mission and received the icon but when i got to put it on it's not there.  Anyone know when it will show up or if its a bug?

replies.body: Most of those MIA Arcade Poros have been spotted by now. Somewhere along the way, they got a little lost, but thankfully someone was able to guide their patch with some arcade wards. Feel free to hit me back up if you still don't see yours!
